storyInfo: Responding to an application for emergency support from a Leithanien branch office, Sussurro leads a Rhodes Island Medic team to assist on-site. A monster onslaught, Infected, injured... disaster has already taken place.

attributes.content: What time is it?
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: Four o'clock. That's the billionth time you've asked.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: I'm in a hurry! Aren't you?
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: Calm down. Why hurry? They're already hustling over from the landship. If they just make it safe and sound, we can thank all we can.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Seriously, how do they make it from the landship in three days? Kinda impressive, landship.
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: You've never been to Rhodes Island's ship?
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Nope. The fare for this wasn't cheap, and I still have a pile on my plate.
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: The landship has this kind of large floating vessel. Moves really fast too. Bet you've never seen it, huh.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Floating? Like, a car that floats?
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: It sure isn't a car... I don't actually know the exact name myself.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Ohh, it's the kind those old Casters pilot in their towers, the really advanced kind that can drift through the air, is it?
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: Not that either!
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Okay, you stop guessing. I haven't seen it much, and I can't explain it too well. Take one look at it and you'll get it.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: If you're this bored, give the car another check. We're squeezed for time getting back already. No wrong turns.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Fine, fine, fine... you're the boss, it's your call.
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: Come to mention it, who've we got coming from the landship?
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: You've never even been there. You wouldn't know any names if I told you.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: We're filing an emergency application here. No matter who it is, it's gotta be one of the Medical Department's best.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: We're in pretty deep here. What kind of best are we talking about?
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: No need to fuss about it.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Oh, here they come.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: That's... a pretty fierce vehicle. The landship has stuff like that? Color me surprised.
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: Knock it off. Get ready to meet 'em.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Welcome to Leithania. I'm Feraligus, officer in charge of the local branch office. Just call me Ferl.
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Good to meet you. I'm Landship Medic Operator Sussurro, and these are my assistants.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: What are you staring for? Where's your hellos?
attributes.name: Office Operator B

attributes.content: Oh! Oh! Right.
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: I'm the branch office's... driver... wait, uh, I'm an Operator at the local branch office, codename Piston.
attributes.name: Office Operator A

attributes.content: Situation's complicated, and we're pressed for time. Let's all get in the car for now.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Regarding the details of the emergency situation, we've stamped all the information. Best look over it while we're driving.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Alright, thank you very much.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: We've also brought some equipment, so if you could move that into the car, please.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Al... alright.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Two hours later
Let me see the second file.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Look over this report for me. Confirm if there's any additional kit we need to prepare.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Right away.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: (Hey!)
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: What? Why so secret?
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Keep it down!
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Didn't you say they sent their best? Why's this little lady leading them?
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Watch what you say, kid. I'll knock your bonus.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: When'd you learn to judge people by appearances like an idiot? Did you get nothing from the employee handbook?
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Rein your mouth in if you don't get it. She's one of the elite from Medical Department.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Okay, okay, okay... my bad, my bad.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Ferl, sir.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: I've finished reading through the files, and I have a few questions.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: According to the descriptions, most of those requiring medical aid here are not infected with Oripathy?
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: That's right. The account from the Leithanien government is that a Catastrophe wrecked a city and caused casualties, but the actual situation's more messy than that.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Was it a lapse on a Catastrophe Messenger's part?
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Currently... doesn't look like it.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: There were no problems with the Catastrophe evac op. At least, nothing cropped up during the whole course of things.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: The one issue is... nobody knew about the needlefly nests under the path of the Catastrophe. At least ten counted, huge ones.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: That village there started shifting nomadic beforehand, but there were over a hundred needleflies escaping the Catastrophe that ran straight into the migration team...
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Needleflies? The meter-plus carnivorous insects?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Over a hundred??
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: ...I see...
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Do we have a casualty count yet?
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Leithanien government sources haven't given clear figures.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: It's been two days, and they still haven't produced any conclusions...
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Which indicates they're temporarily unable to enumerate casualties.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Estate guards brought a hell of a lot of wounded to a nearby town, but we weren't in time to check one by one.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Does the branch office still have adequate medical supplies? How much antidote for needlefly poison do we have in reserve? How well have surgery facilities been maintained?
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: How about the mobilization of other local first-aid teams to the area? I need this information, and it's not included in the files.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Medical supplies-wise, still plenty for the time being.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Local powers began first-aid work straight away, and after getting the commission, the R.I. branch office received ample emergency rescue supplies too.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Medical facilities are in alright shape, but it's not automatic, and we're desperately short of people.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: The town doctors are pretty well-trained, but lack emergency response experience, and most have never seen a disaster of this scale in their lives.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: The branch office's town isn't highly populous, so there's only three small clinics in all, and even fewer doctors who can perform surgery.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Plenty of injured can't hold through to the operating table.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: We're accommodating a lot of refugees at the office right now. The outlook's not happy at all.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Moreover, given the whole mess, we've been unable to sort patients.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Some of them we've been sent are Infected... and after Infected pass away... you get what I mean.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: ...I understand.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: There's still some way to go. Take a rest for now.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: There's quite a few here already.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: By now, the injured should all be transferred near the branch office. The other office staff ought to be in the middle of handling them.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Piston, you wait here. There'll be supply cars from other stations in a bit. You catch them.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: I just sit here and wait? Is that gonna work?
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: This is your first time on this sort of mission. The on-site situation is more brutal than you think. Just sit tight here, and receive and allocate the medical supplies.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: You're kidding me. If that bunch of girls can go, what's a big man like me afraid of.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: ...Brat.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Fine. Don't say I didn't warn you.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.text: In the town square, a space not that large to begin with, injured fill the ground, their numbers far beyond the limits of what medical treatment can process.
It's the third day since this calamity occurred, and the stench of festering wounds and exposed blood chokes the air.

attributes.content: Water... I need water...
attributes.name: Unrecognizable Injured

attributes.content: Papa! Papa!
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Mutilated Injured

attributes.content: Someone get over here! This Infected's almost done for!
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Infected! D-Don't come near me.
attributes.name: Regular Injured

attributes.content: What are you doing here? Get back to the treatment area, quick.
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Guards! Guards! Anyone!
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: ...oh, my god... this...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: It's even worse than I thought.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: When I came yesterday, the courtyard over there was still a cargo station from the local council. Now it's been appropriated as a normal patient treatment area.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: They don't have enough doctors. Only the most seriously injured get prioritized for the treatment rooms.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: What's the situation... with those lying on the ground?
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: These are all Infected by my reckoning. This town's pretty small, and has no Infected quarter, and they can't keep them in the same place as the regular people...
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: But they can't just be strewn across the plaza. Operator Ferl, how much space can you make in the office warehouse?
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: I'm arranging to get everything moved out. Shouldn't be much of a problem.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: We still need a space to hold the injured Infected. Ideally, somewhere that can be isolated...
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Then we can empty out the operator dorms. That'll need a bit of time.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: I'll leave it to you.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Team one to the warehouse, and inspect the condition of Infected.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Teams two and three with me, and move all equipment into the operating room!
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: I'll have to leave classifying the injured to you, along with the corresponding zones they go to.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Al—Alright.
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: I—I'll pitch in too.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Good. You come help me out. Carry these few indoors with me.
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Before we use Originium Arts to expedite wound healing, we must confirm they're all cleared and cleaned.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: If the wounds aren't severe, then hold off using Arts as much as possible. A doctor's strength is our most precious resource right now; only reasonable allocation can allow us to save even more lives.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Deal with this bed first! This patient is critical!
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: (Gasps)
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Needleflies bit his arm off as he was protecting his family. He was unconscious by the time he got to us.
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: He's Infected, but his illness is stable.
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: And his arm...? Do we still have his shorn limb?
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Wound is already bacterially infected. Left hand also has visible broad lesions. It will likely still require partial amputation.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: At this rate... both his arms are going to be...
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Go and assist team two. Leave this end to me.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Bless you!
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Don't lose focus. Prepare for Infected emergency treatment.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Patient's surface crystallization is located in the throat. Inspecting blood.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Watch his wrist scales, and ready Savra-specialized scalpels.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: This room's still too dark. Piston, sir, check the condition of the generator.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Three hours later
Within the office infirmary, operation on the acutely injured still hasn't stopped.
Doctor... am I hopeless... Doctor, you have to tell me...
attributes.name: Wounded

attributes.content: Internal bleeding relatively severe. Change the bottle on the blood suction machine.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: I'm begging you... I'm begging you, Doctor, take this ring... take it to my wife, I'm begging you...
attributes.name: Wounded

attributes.content: You're going to live. Stay with me.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Gauze out! Need more!
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Don't... Don't lie to me, I know...
attributes.name: Wounded

attributes.content: Don't speak! You're going to live, I guarantee it!
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Hold down here for me, and I'll suture.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Hydrogen peroxide's out! Someone go to the warehouse and bring a box!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Piston, sir!
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: On it! I-I'll go right away.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Bleeding stopped. The rest is yours. I'm checking on the other beds.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Over here! Doctor! One just came in, they're on the brink!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'm coming.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.text: The man laid on the stretcher gasps a mottled breath, his state almost too miserable to look at.
A giant gash is torn across his abdomen, the cavity's contents exposed until now to Leithania's frigid winds.
Parts of his organs have already been contaminated by needlefly toxin, the scent of it nauseating.
Yet his consciousness is still fully with him—it may be the poison is stimulating his nerves, strangely colored bodily fluids dripping incessantly from his mouth and nostrils.

attributes.content: *cough*... ngh...
attributes.name: Moribund Injured

attributes.content: Thoracoabdominal injury. Open wound to abdomen.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Push him in, prioritize him for treatment, and incise his esophagus and windpipe!
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: ...oh, god... oh, god...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: ...this...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Don't stop! There are still other patients!
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Look for any internal organ damage! Find any points of bleeding in his peritoneum! Quickly!
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: ...I... I'm a little—
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Sorry... I... I.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: That's alright, you did well. Head outside and rest for now.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Thank you... thank you...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: ...this is too much...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Ulghh...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.text: The young Leithanien's strained nerves are finally relaxed for a moment.
After profusely vomiting in an alley behind the infirmary, he feels both a weight off his back, and an immense regret of the extra bun he ate this morning.

attributes.content: ...Do the landship guys... see this stuff all the time?
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: ...urgh... not again... urlgh...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: You okay?
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: I'm alright... I'm alright, I'm just not that used to all this...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Here, a towel. Wipe your face.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: ...urghh... kinda embarrassing. Didn't think I'd be the first on the scene who couldn't keep going.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: It's alright. You haven't been doing bad.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: You're telling me that didn't suck?
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: You went and volunteered to help, held out for half the day, and you're no Medic Operator. I figured you'd give in after half an hour.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: That girl... no, that Medic Operator. She's something major alright.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Hah. What did I tell you before, huh? They're from the landship, from HQ. They're the best.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: That Medic Op, Sussurro, was there for the Palermo incident a few years back. Don't underestimate her.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: The Palermo incident? Oh... that big one that stirred up Siracusa?
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: It was an Originium mine explosion, right? I remember a whole lot of civs got infected bad. Couldn't prepare enough treatment. Led to a huge number of acute Infected dead... I think half the city was on the edge of collapsing.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: That's what hell on earth truly is. Imagine it, a huge breakout of acute Infected, people's remains everywhere, already starting to disintegrate, whole air full of active dust. It's a terrifying scene.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Almost everyone who went through Palermo got left with heavy psychological trauma.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: And to our Medic Op here, the scene today is barely anything.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.text: The young Leithanien falls silent, crouched on the ground, window of the Rhodes Island branch office above his head.
He looks out towards the plaza.
Not far away, the people in the zone for minorly injured throng about.
And on the other side of the rigged-up divider wall, the infirmary is still a battlefield.

attributes.content: Forget it. I'll go back in to help.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Calm down first.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: You don't want to throw up in there, that'll just give them all trouble.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Fair.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: If you want to help out so bad, go to the reception area and see if there's any communication work. Check to see if any other supply cars arrived while you're there.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Okay... I'm going now!
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: ...Hah, brat.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Phew... Heavens...
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Ah, Doctor. How's it gone?
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: We owe you for this. Most of the injured are stable, and now it's just up to the lord's end for follow-up arrangements.
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: I used to doubt you were a medical company at all. I really am... truly am... sorry I thought that.
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Thank you, thank you so much, I... I can't find any better words right now. If you hadn't saved us, the casualties and the accompanying disaster would've been unimaginable.
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: No, I... I'm just an errand boy... um...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: How are the Medic Operators? Are they on break?
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: I'm not too sure where they've gone either—I thought you Rhodes Islanders would've had a better idea than me. I see your dormitory's been used to rest the injured?
attributes.name: Local Doctor

attributes.content: Then I know. You go rest up for now.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Cap, HQ's sent med...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Shh, keep it quiet!
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.text: The elder Operator points towards the other end of the room, where a few reinforcement Medic Operators who rushed over from other offices are inspecting the conditions of the injured in the warehouse.
Their steps quietly shuffle back and forth between the patients, trying their best not to make noise.
Behind them, other Medic Operators who've fought through the whole day are sat against the wall, spent after over ten hours of consecutive operation.
That delicately framed doctor is huddled together with all the others, sleeping in a corner of the room.
In the quiet warehouse, the only noise is that of people breathing, respiring, but her light snores are distinct to pick out among them.

Her uniform and medical shielding equipment are covered in a mess, blood plasma, tissue fluid and indistinguishable fragments of flesh having left copious stains, the rancid scent having still not dispersed. It doesn't bother her, though, as she's fallen asleep just like that.
A multitude of breaths accompany her snores, rough and heavy, light and soft, among which are the breaths of the many she pulled back from death's door today.
Once tomorrow comes, these people will all thank her, and they'll thank that delicate doctor for the rest of their lives.

attributes.content: If something's up, we'll talk outside.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: They... nah, let them rest.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: How's the reception area?
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: No problems. Lord's people are all here, and they've shifted off the first batch of the lightly injured.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: As long as it's all going well.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: If there's something you wanna say, say it. Quit stopping and starting.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Not much... just, I feel like...
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: You want to resign?
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: No, I just feel like I've gotten to know this part of Rhodes Island's work a bit deeper... pretty much. Just a bit.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: It's good to have enthusiasm. Since you still do, go check on how our medical supply consumption's doing.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Make two reports, one for the office records, and one to hand to the local government tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Okay... I'm going now.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Four days later
Everything packed up?
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Yes, no problem.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: I'm back, I'm back! Almost didn't make it!
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: What did you go off to do?!
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Ah! This is the stuff you asked me to buy for you, right, Dr. Sussurro? Got it all here.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: This much?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: *clears throat*... These are books for Dr. Kal'tsit, and this is a souvenir for Dr. Gavial.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: What's this, snacks?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Those are a... little present for the Doctor.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Doctor? You mean... that Doctor?
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: To keep things brief, say hello to Dr. Kal'tsit and the Doctor for me.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Alright, no problem.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: And finally, I hope you have a good journey, and make it back safe.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Thank you very much. We'll see you next time.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: They're off.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Alright. Time to head back and do some work. We've still got a mountain of reports to write.
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Feraligus

attributes.content: Maybe I oughta look for a work opportunity, head to the Rhodes Island landship and see for myself... Feels like it's all amazing people over there.
attributes.name: Piston

attributes.content: Sure. But finish the work you've got first, and then you can mull it over.
attributes.name: Feraligus
